Title: UST South Korea Scholarship For Fall 2025 (Fully Funded)
Description: Scholarships in South KoreaUST South Korea Scholarship For Fall 2025 (Fully Funded)ByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-April 24, 2025
Eligibility:
To be eligible for theUST Scholarship for Fall 2025 intake, applicants must meet the requirements set by the University of Science and Technology for International students.
Applicants of all nationalities from any country can apply.Candidates should provide all the required documents as specified in the online application form.Korean citizens are not eligible to apply.Candidates applying for the UST Master’s Program must have completed a Bachelor’s Degree.Students applying for a Ph.D. must have completed or expect to complete their Master’s degree.Read theAdmission Guidelines for International students.
Degree Offered: Master’s, PhD, Master’s Leading to PhD

Title: GKS Korean Government Undergraduate Scholarship 2025 (Fully Funded)
Description: Scholarships in South KoreaGKS Korean Government Undergraduate Scholarship 2025 (Fully Funded)ByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-September 11, 2024
Eligibility:
Citizens of all countries can apply except Korean citizens.Applicants who have a bachelor‟s degree cannot apply.Applicants who have associate degrees can only apply to a bachelor’s program.CGPA should be above 2.64 out of 4, 2.80 out of 4.3, 2.91 out of 4.5, or 3.23 out of 5.0The score percentile must be 80 percent or above.Should be under the age of 25 years.Must be in good healthNo criminal record.
For Result Waiting applicants:
Applicants who are expected to graduate must first submit a certificate of expected graduation at the time of application.
